title: Can we get what other people get as long as we endeavor enough? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey there! What a strange question. There is a lot of jealousy and envy. I can confidently tell you that you can get what other people can’t even dream of getting. You can get what YOU want. Not what other people get. All you have to do is WANT it bad enough. If you do, the way will show itself to you. Then you can start your endeavor :) Hope that helps. Cheers!

if U mean understanding, then it’s possible. Issue complexity, education, interests, beliefs, attitudes, biases, openness, prejudices, values ect determine if U do. I would love to understand Quantum Physics but I lack knowledge. Good luck.
